descr.p: "Pistol Packin' Mama" is a 1943 song. The song is notable in that it was the first number one on the Juke Box Folk Records chart, which would later be known as the Hot Country Songs chart. The version performed by Bing Crosby and The Andrews Sisters would be first number on the Juke Box Folk records charts followed by the version performed by Al Dexter . The B-side of the Al Dexter version of "Pistol Packin' Mama, a song entitled, "Rosalita" would hit number one on the same chart later in the year.
